alert.note: Alert for Adair; Adams; Cass; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison; Ringgold; Taylor; Union (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 10:50PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Madison, southeastern Cass, western Union, southern Guthrie, Adams, northwestern Ringgold, Taylor, southwestern Dallas and Adair Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1049 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Guthrie Center to near Lake Icaria to near Braddyville. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Guthrie Center around 1055 PM CDT. Stuart and Panora around 1105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Creston, Bedford, Green Valley Lake, Dallas Center and Adel. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 73 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for central, south central, southwestern and west central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Adams; Cass; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison; Ringgold; Taylor; Union
